Spray until surface is moist. Avoid contact before the surface dries. Repeat as necessary.\r\nFOR TREATMENT OF AN AVERAGE SIZED ROOM (30 cubic metres): Close all doors and windows. Keep room closed for 15 minutes and then ventilate the room thoroughly.\r\nFOR SURFACE TREATMENT: For mosquitoes and cockroaches, spray screens, around doors and windows from about 0.5 metres where they enter and land.
